summary: This MOD allows you to switch Queen Miraak 1.1 as your follower.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][color=#f6b26b][b]First, this MOD is built on  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43529/?]Miraak - Dragonborn Follower [color=#6d9eeb]1.7 version[/color][/url], thanks transientfaith very much~!
Just a compatibility patch, alone can't run, you must installed miraak follower main file.
Of course she have a female vioce, I make her mask transparent and dragon aspect without helmet.
And than you should use this compatibility patch to cover the [color=#f6b26b][b]Miraak[/b][/color] follower main file.
It will allow you to switch [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70364?]Queen Miraak[/url] as your follower[/b][/color][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][color=#f6b26b][b].
[color=#ff7700][size=5]
Have a good time, guy~![/size][/color][/b][/color]
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS]
[size=3][b][color=#ffe599]-Require[/color]-[/b][/size]
[color=#ffe599][b]Skyrim and Dragonborn dlc
Skse and Sky UI
Queen Miraak 1.1 by DleamsBlur
Miraak - Dragonborn Follower by transientfaith
[/b][/color]
[color=#f6b26b][size=3][b]Thanks to all the authors for sharing MOD[/b][/size][/color][color=#f6b26b][b][size=4][size=3]~！[/size]
[/size][/b][/color]
[color=#ffe599][size=3][b]-Credits[/b][/size][/color][size=3][color=#ffe599][b]-[/b][/color][b]
